content: *when you re not texting keep your fingers warm and toasty with these convertible flip top mittens lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # l32244 skill level easy + level 3 size adult multiple sizes adult s/m m/l finished length 10 10-1/2 in 25 5 26 5 cm finished width 3-1/2 4 in 9 10 cm heartland article #136 1 ball *shown in isle royale* double-pointed needles - size 6 double-pointed needles - size 7 split ring stitch markers stitch holders about 1 yd 1 m of contrast color sewing thread or thin yarn nice easy pattern for flip-top mittens *lion brand notes * mittens are worked in one piece in the round on double pointed needles with a slightly tighter gauge to produce a sturdy fabric cuffs are worked in rib then remainder of mitten is worked in st st worked in rnds k every round thumbs are placed to create a left and a right mitten contrast color thread or yarn is used to mark the position of the flip top flip top and thumb are worked onto completed mitten
